DOC.brief_summary: This trial design compare different treatment Lisfranc fracture . The trial consist 2 different stratum . Stratum 1 : In mild injury comparison conservative treatment operative treatment open reduction internal fixation ( ORIF ) . Stratum 2 : In severe injury comparison operative treatment open reduction internal fixation ( ORIF ) primary arthrodesis . The primary outcome measure AOFAS Midfoot Score , secondary outcome measure VAS Foot Ankle .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study find effective way treat Lisfranc injury
DOC.criteria: Stratum 1 : Nondislocated fracture affect tarsometatarsal ( TMT ) joint II III Dislocation < 5mm medial cuneiforme base II metatarsal ( MT ) No fracture affect TMT joint IV V Stratum 2 : Affected joint TMT II III + TMT Any dislocation > 2mm ( fracture TMT joint ) Dislocation > 5mm medial cuneiforme base II MT Open fracture Extraarticular metatarsal ( MT ) fracture Extremely comminuted fracture bone loss , slight chance gain proper reduction screw Patients multiple fracture Patients weak cooperation ( dementia , alcohol use , etc . ) Patients significant neuropathy neurological condition , diabetes rheumatoid arthritis Patients severe circulatory disorder lower limb Injuries 14 day Patients previous foot injury surgery Pregnancy Patients refuse participate
